thread.title: Pizza Schmizza Named Third Best Pizza Franchise by franchiserankings.com for September 2015
thread.title_full: Pizza Schmizza Named Third Best Pizza Franchise by franchiserankings.com for September 2015

title: Pizza Schmizza Named Third Best Pizza Franchise by franchiserankings.com for September 2015
text:
September 19, 2015 03:00 ET Pizza Schmizza Named Third Best Pizza Franchise by franchiserankings.com for September 2015 
NAPLES, FL --(Marketwired - September 19, 2015) - franchiserankings.com, the leading provider of reviews and ratings on franchises, has named Pizza Schmizza as the third best Pizza franchise for the month of September 2015. The rankings are produced at the start of the month based on ongoing research and analysis of thousands of franchises. While there are thousands of franchises that offer entrepreneurs the opportunity to start their own Pizza, the rankings only consist of those which performed the best during the evaluation process. 
During the evaluation process the independent research team investigates thousands of franchise opportunities to determine which provide their franchisees with the best overall opportunity. Five areas of evaluation are used in order to benchmark and compare each of the Pizza franchises across areas that have been found to be most prevalent in successful franchises. These five areas of evaluation include growth prospect, marketing support, training, ongoing support, and value. 
For the benefit of a more in-depth analysis the independent research team also connects with clients and franchisees of the franchises being evaluated in order to obtain additional feedback on the franchises listed. Client references provide the research team with information on how the franchise operates, the working conditions of employees at franchised businesses, and their experience in working with the franchise. Often times clients of the franchises will connect directly with franchiserankings.com. 
Based on the results of the evaluation process Pizza Schmizza has been named the third best Pizza franchise by franchiserankings.com for the month of September 2015. Entrepreneurs looking for successful Pizza franchises should consider Pizza Schmizza. 
franchiserankings.com is the leading provider of reviews and ratings on franchises and franchise providers. The rankings are updated each month to reflect new developments and achievements from the franchises being considered for the evaluation process.
